name: Cub - ID
description:
Proof of concept for a non traditional 3D platformer focused on exploration and  unexpected ability chanllenges. Go for the 5 large cubes, end the level and proceed to he next one.

Controls (Controller recomended):

Jump                                  -> Space Bar / A

Pick up/Drop things-> Left click / B

Use things                     -> Right click / X

Move with the arroys or joystick, camera changes on its own

Do not own any of the music, all the other assets are original.
